alert.note: Alert for Quitman; Tallahatchie (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:24PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Yalobusha, Tallahatchie and southeastern Quitman Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1024 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vance, or 12 miles west of Charleston, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Webb, Sumner, Paynes, Vance, Scobey, Oakland, Bryant, Distall, Cascilla, Mikoma, Tippo, Stover, Tillatoba, Leverett, Waverly, Brazil, Effie and Rosebloom. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
